textBeforeTable: All events are scheduled for Friday, July 10th from 9am - 5pm at the Hilton, Northwest 5 Room. 1.3 Discussion Period #3 4:10-5:00 1.2 Discussion Period #2 3:20-4:10 1.1 Discussion Period #1 11:10-12:00 1 All events are scheduled for Friday, July 10th from 9am - 5pm at the Hilton, Northwest 5 Room. Contents If you have slides or want to share other information on your topic, please link to your topic in the schedule below. A link looks like this Unconference Main Page. Click the "Edit" button above to see the syntax. For the presentations, you will have access to the Internet, a projector, and a computer. For the discussions, you will have access to wireless Internet, but you will need to provide a computer for your table if you want one. You are not obligated to use any of the technology available. Have fun and be creative. This day is all about getting out of the box. The presentation and discussion topics will be determined by popular vote by the participants. The voting closed June 22nd at midnight. The open topics will be decided the day of the unconference. While we did have some open topic spaces built into the schedule, some opened because of speaker
